A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I can't believe what I just sat through. Do you like your Star Wars with the deadening weight of potty humor and one liners thrown into every scene? Battles and 'plot lines' that go nowhere? Zero sychronicity of timing\, story flow\, or overarching narrative? Im going to pretend this film didnt happen. This movie trashed what Force Awakens and Rogue One managed to accomplish.
